contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox family name | name = Dreyfus ({{lang-yi|דרײפֿוס}}) | image = | image_size = | caption = | pronunciation = | meaning = | founder = | region = a surname (see [[Dreyfuss]], ''tripod'') originating in the German city of [[Trier]] | chief = | nationality = | language = | related names = | clans = | footnotes = [http://www.ancestry.co.uk/facts/Dreyfus-civil-war.ashx] }} {{TOCright}} '''Dreyfus''' may refer to: * The [[Dreyfus affair]], a French political scandal * [[Dreyfus (1930 film)|''Dreyfus'']], a 1930 German film on the Dreyfus affair * [[Louis Dreyfus Group]], a company * [[Dreyfus Corporation]], a Mellon Financial Corporation subsidiary * [[Disques Dreyfus]], a French record label * [[The Camille and Henry Dreyfus Foundation]], United States-based charitable foundation * [[Berta A. Dreyfus Intermediate School 49]], middle school in Staten Island, New York City * ''[[Centre d'entraînement Robert Louis-Dreyfus]]'', also known as ''La Commanderie,'' training ground of ''Olympique de Marseille'' * [[Dreyfus Prize in the Chemical Sciences]], chemistry award * [[6317 Dreyfus]], main-belt asteroid *[[Dreyfus, Kentucky]], a community in the United States ==People== * [[Dreyfus (surname)]] ==See also== * [[Dreyfuss]] {{disambiguation}}
